DOC.brief_title: Tai Chi Physical Therapy Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Osteoarthritis ( OA ) cause pain long-term disability , public health impact increase population age . In addition inconsistent effectiveness , current treatment nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug , knee replacement , physical therapy may expensive , result serious adverse effect , reduce physical function , fail improve mental well-being . Finding effective treatment maintain function quality life OA patient one national priority identify year Institute Medicine . We propose conduct first comparative effectiveness cost-effectiveness trial Tai Chi vs. physical therapy ( PT ) large symptomatic Knee OA population . A single-blind , randomize , control trial Tai Chi v . Physical Therapy conduct 180 patient meet American College Rheumatology criterion Knee OA . Patients randomize 12 week treatment Tai Chi ( 2x/week ) Standard Physical Therapy ( 2x/week 6 week , follow 6 week rigorous supervise home exercise ) 24 52 week follow-up .
